FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING GENUINE AGRARIAN REFORM IN THE COUNTRY AND CREATING THE MECHANISM FOR ITS IMPLEMENTATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Genuine Agrarian Reform Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Distributes lands at no cost to farmer beneficiaries within five (5) years to realize the peasants’ emancipation from the centuries old feudal bondage to the soil thus stating that the monopoly and control of few landlords show that the bogus Comprehensive Agrarian Reform Program (CARP) was implemented to only appease peasant interest, a counter insurgency trick to create an illusion of land reform.
